subject: Politics
title: Taxation and Revenue
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Taxation and Revenue.

hook.text: Benjamin Franklin said only death and taxes are certain. Governments can't work without revenue.

buildup.text: Taxes fund roads, schools, defense, and healthcare â€” everything government provides to the public.

discovery.text: Progressive taxes charge the rich more. Regressive taxes like sales tax hit the poor harder.

twist.text: Tax policy decides who pays for society and who benefits. It's the most political issue in government.

climax.text: High-tax countries like Denmark have strong services. Low-tax nations have thinner safety nets.

punchline.text: Taxes are the price of civilization. The fight is over who pays.

quiz.question: What is a regressive tax?
options: A tax that hits poorer people harder, like sales tax
A tax that charges the rich a higher rate
A tax that decreases every year
